bonus.value: Increase damage dealt by 6%/7.5%/9% for each enemy nearby. Up to 3 stacks.

mind.name: Scheme
mind.desc: Be careful not to get dragged into the mire it's in.

memory.name: Opportunity
memory.desc: It's always patient, enough for some unlucky sap to step on it eventually.

belief.name: Confusion
belief.desc: It's not moving. Is it asleep or just conserving energy?

emotion.name: Restlessness
emotion.desc: It gets bored too, and when it feels restless, it's some innocent passersby who might suffer.
